EmailTemplate.name: CADMVComplaintAcknowledgementToComplainant
EmailTemplate.subject: Complaint Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Complaint Submission
Hi {!PublicComplaint.FirstName} {!PublicComplaint.LastName},
This notice confirms the successful submission of complaint number {!PublicComplaint.Name}. We appreciate your concern and will contact you if additional information is needed.
If you have any questions, please contact the compliance office at DMVLODOLOCOMPLAINTS@dmv.ca.gov.
This email was sent from an unattended mailbox. Please do not respond using the "Reply" button.
Sincerely,
Occupational Licensing Branch
CA Department of Motor Vehicles
